jobs.name: Morning Mobile Brief
jobs.description: Quick daily overview optimized for mobile

payload.message: Generate a mobile-optimized morning brief. Keep it SHORT — this is read on a phone screen. 1) Device: battery, storage, any issues. 2) Weather: today's forecast in one line. 3) Calendar: next 3 events. 4) Any queued tasks from overnight. Use bullet points, no long paragraphs. Under 200 words.

jobs.name: Sync Check
jobs.description: Verify file sync between mobile and other devices

payload.message: Quick sync check. If sync is configured in TOOLS.md: 1) Is the device on WiFi? 2) When was the last successful sync? 3) Any files out of sync? If sync is not configured or device is on cellular, skip. Only send a message if there's an issue.
